mapper.insert: insert into t_scenery_order(user_name, user_phone, id_number, user_sex, user_note, scenery_name, ticket_type, scenery_price, scenery_number, start_date, totalPrice,orderUserName) VALUES (#{userName},#{userPhone},#{idNumber},#{userSex},#{userNote},#{sceneryName},#{ticketType},#{sceneryPrice},#{sceneryNumber},#{startDate},#{totalPrice},#{orderUserName})
